%c[guide_blue]Dynamic news%c[default] allows stalkers to report on their experiences in the Zone.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default] 
Stalkers will comment on events that they have seen or heard near their location, or on their current activities, using the PDA communications network.
 
These events and activities can range from something as mundane as complaining about the price of goods sold by a trader, to requesting help from faction allies when under attack.
 
Many other features also tie into the system; stalkers may comment on suspicious activity when you are hunting a bounty, giving you an idea where your target is, or may mention if somebody has a job available.
 
This feature can be toggled from the UI/HUD options menu and is enabled by default.

%c[guide_blue]Extended HUD%c[default] allows the display of additional on-screen information.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default] 
With this feature enabled brief companion information and a miniaturised version of the artefact belt are made visible on the heads-up display.
 
This feature can be toggled from the UI/HUD options menu and is disabled by default.

%c[guide_blue]Portrait by outfit%c[default] changes your portrait based on your current outfit.
 
%c[guide_green]Information%c[default] 
With this feature enabled, every time you equip or unequip an outfit (not including headgear) your character's portrait will be updated to reflect this, mimicking how portraits for the AI match with how they look.
 
This feature can be toggled from the UI/HUD options menu and is disabled by default.
